overview: Thomas Cook is Vice President of Operations and Co-founder of Politics4all. He has worked in the Internet field for over 14 years helping small businesses to Fortune 500 companies develop and grow their internet strategies. He is the Founder of Virticle Corp, a Web Design and Development agency, where he manages and evolves an array of mission critical Web applications and content management systems, helps new businesses conceptualize and develop strategies to make the transition to the Web and also helps more established companies define their Web presence. He has also been a part of cultivating new business, enhancing an existing client bases, and forming strategic relationships. Thomas has an innovative mindset with an intuitive business sense and a unique talent as a creative problem solver and big picture thinker.
